text: COURT OF AUDITORS Special Report 14/2020 ‘EU development aid to Kenya’ (2020/C 301/11) The European Court of Auditors hereby informs you that Special Report 14/2020 ‘EU development aid to Kenya’ has just been published. The report can be accessed for consultation or downloading on the European Court of Auditors’ website: http://eca.europa.eu EN Official Journal of the European Union 11.9.2020 C 301/15
